  • Field Details

    • MALE

      public static final int MALE
      Variable which represents a male. It's useful to call the male worker through the player's array.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • FEMALE

      public static final int FEMALE
      Variable which represents a female. It's useful to call the female worker through the player's array.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Worker

  • Method Details

    • setSlot

      public boolean setSlot​(Slot slot)
      This methods automatically updates the Slot's worker. The method Slot.setWorker(Worker) mustn't be called.
      Parameters:
      slot - slot where Worker is going to be placed
      Returns:
      true if the slot has been set correctly, false otherwise

    • getSlot

      public Slot getSlot()

    • getColor

      public Color getColor()

    • getGender

      public Gender getGender()

    • updatePosition

      public boolean updatePosition​(Slot destinationSlot)
      This method update some parameters that are modified with a worker's movement Who calls the method has to keep in mind that this method set the worker of the previous slot null and THEN put the worker in the new slot.
      Parameters:
      destinationSlot - the slot where the worker is going to move to
      Returns:
      true if the worker voluntarily moved up to the level 3, false otherwise

    • move

      public boolean move​(Direction direction) throws InvalidMoveException, java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      This method moves a worker from a slot to another, towards the destination specified.
      Parameters:
      direction - where the worker wants to move to.
      Returns:
      true if the worker voluntarily moved up to the level 3, false otherwise
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the direction is out of the board.
      InvalidMoveException - if the move is not permitted.

    • build

      public void build​(Direction direction) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, InvalidBuildException
      This method builds in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - where the worker wants to build to.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the destination Slot is outside the Board
      InvalidBuildException - if the build is not permitted.

    • buildDome

      public void buildDome​(Direction direction) throws InvalidDirectionException
      Throws:
      InvalidDirectionException

    • checkDirection

      public void checkDirection​(Direction direction) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      This method check if in the direction chosen by the Player exists a slot.
      Parameters:
      direction - the chosen direction
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the slot in the direction doesn't exist.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
